thread.title: BRIEF-Kbs Fashion Group Limited Announces A New Long Term Contract

title: BRIEF-Kbs Fashion Group Limited Announces A New Long Term Contract

organizations.name: term contract reuters staff kbs fashion group ltd

text: March 15, 2018 / 3:53 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Kbs Fashion Group Limited Announces A New Long Term Contract Reuters Staff Kbs Fashion Group Ltd: * KBS FASHION GROUP LIMITED ANNOUNCES A NEW LONG TERM CONTRACT * KBS FASHION - ESTIMATED THAT PURSUANT TO AGREEMENT, CO WILL GENERATE ADDITIONAL RMB 25 MILLION OF REVENUE IN 2018 * KBS FASHION GROUP SAYS ITS CHINA-BASED SUBSIDIARY, KAI XIN ENTERED LONG TERM STRATEGIC COOPERATION AGREEMENT WITH HANGZHOU ZHI YIN APPAREL CLOTHES CO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
